list.name: Default
list.comment:
Update Mapping Directory.
++++++++ New Python Version : update from 3.6.X to 3.7.X +++++++++
### Admin.py ###
+ Add filter qs for fields in models. + Remove save_formset method from RegularUserAdmin Class, Modified save_model
### Models.py ###
- Removed slug field from Image Class - Remove save_method from Image Class - Remove save_mehtod from Keyword Class - Added custom regex validation to Keyword.keyword
### Signals.py ###
+ Added new signal for update grammar file in post_delete keyword
### SpeechDetector.py ###
+ Added get_search function + Added set_keyword_spotted function
### Tasks.py ###
+ Added remove_keyword function
### Validator.py ###
+ Added new validatos to validate_keyword
### Views.py ###
+ In videoGallery view: Modified initial queryset + Added decode_speech function to Celery task queue + Modified matching string of image-menu + Modified matching string of Subir Vol, Bajar vol and menu principal
### Settings.py ###
+ Modified Allowed Host to ['*'] + Added support for Heroku deployment + Set up celery settings + Modified Login URL + Added Static root path to project

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Deleted wav files. Added procfile for Heroku Deployment. Fixed video lightbox
